UI_Ttl_T_NewGame_Inst.speaker: UI
UI_Ttl_T_NewGame_Inst.text: Select a protagonist and embark on a new adventure.

UI_Ttl_T_Continue_Inst.speaker: UI
UI_Ttl_T_Continue_Inst.text: Resume your adventure from where you left off.

UI_Ttl_T_Option_Inst.speaker: UI
UI_Ttl_T_Option_Inst.text: Adjust a variety of game settings.

UI_Ttl_ItemName_KeyboardConfig_Inst.speaker: UI
UI_Ttl_ItemName_KeyboardConfig_Inst.text: Adjust your key configuration when using a keyboard.

UI_Ttl_T_LoadFolder_Inst.speaker: UI
UI_Ttl_T_LoadFolder_Inst.text:
Resume your adventure using saved data from
previous protagonists or playthroughs.
Saved data can be deleted here as well.

UI_DataTransfer_Detail_Param.speaker: UI
UI_DataTransfer_Detail_Param.text: Disable to reset values to their defaults. If your battle rank is high, your starting stats will be too.

UI_DataTransfer_Detail_Arts.speaker: UI
UI_DataTransfer_Detail_Arts.text: Carry over your techs and spells (including custom and inherited techs).

UI_DataTransfer_Detail_Role.speaker: UI
UI_DataTransfer_Detail_Role.text: Carry over your roles and souls (including soul ranks).

UI_DataTransfer_Detail_MonsterArts.speaker: UI
UI_DataTransfer_Detail_MonsterArts.text: Enable to carry over absorption status from when the game was last completed. Disable to reset values to their defaults.

UI_DataTransfer_Detail_Item.speaker: UI
UI_DataTransfer_Detail_Item.text: Enable to carry over items possessed when the game was last completed. Disable to reset values to their defaults.

UI_DataTransfer_Detail_Mission.speaker: UI
UI_DataTransfer_Detail_Mission.text: Carry over both Mr. S's trials and your Trial Rank.

UI_DataTransfer_Detail_Hp.speaker: UI
UI_DataTransfer_Detail_Hp.text: Disable to reset values to their defaults. If your battle rank is high, your starting stats will be too.

UI_DataTransfer_Detail_SkillLevel.speaker: UI
UI_DataTransfer_Detail_SkillLevel.text: Disable to reset values to their defaults. If your battle rank is high, your starting stats will be too.

UI_DataTransfer_Detail_BattleRank.speaker: UI
UI_DataTransfer_Detail_BattleRank.text: Enable to make your foes stronger. Your characters will also start out stronger and grow more easily.

UI_Ttl_T_CloudSave_Inst.speaker: UI
UI_Ttl_T_CloudSave_Inst.text: Back up save data to the cloud, or restore it to your device.

UI_DataTransfer_SelectDialog_Text.speaker: UI
UI_DataTransfer_SelectDialog_Text.text:
In this game, data from completed playthroughs can be
carried over into future playthroughs. As a general rule,
each category will be kept updated so its greatest value
is always recorded. It's possible to choose which categories
carry over yourself, but you can also start a new game
as is and just use the game's recommended categories.
Would you like to choose which categories carry over?
